points: Led the entire frontend-to-backend integration of Nenzy.ai, an AI-driven interviewing SaaS, using Vue.js and Nuxt3, ensuring seamless user experience.
Designed and implemented the Audio Interview system, enabling AI-driven candidate assessments that signifcantly enhanced the platform's core functionality and user engagement.
Made meaningful contributions to Organization's active Open Source projects.
Portsicle is a suite of tunneling and proxy services.
With Portsicle, you can expose local servers to the internet or use the transparent proxy to monitor your devices' network traffic.
A platform where folks from same college can exchange/sell their resource books and other stuff.
Aimed to address the challenge faced by my juniors who struggle to nd peers with the same resource books for the semester, facilitating resource exchanges by directly connecting them with each other.
A URL shortener that generates unique short links using Base62 encoding of nanosecond-based hashes.
Built with Golang for efficiency and fully server-rendered for fast performance.
